showerReviews.reviewText: I will highly request all the costumers who use shower at PILOT ,TA OR LOVE Use your own towels ‚Ä¶

Very disgusting showers, I‚Äôve been too many truck stops in the country and this by far was the worst shower experience I‚Äôve had. It is actually a health hazard. I told the cashier and she kindly gave me money back. The cashiers were nice, ‚Ä¶

Dirty. Perfectly describes this place. I walked in to this shower room as it is in the pictures. I set my stuff down and immediately noticed there was urine already in the toilet. The sink is disgusting. This location does not deserve your ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The bathroom for truckers are so filthy.  There's mold every where & they did a horrible job at cleaning. I couldn't even take a shower I had wasted a shower. I literally had to go to the love's next door to take a shower

Shower #8.  11/30/2024 9:30pm
This needs an overhaul. You can do better!

Black mold on everything. Orange mold, white mold. Everything rusted and the shower is so hard to turn on because it takes a literal tool to turn it off. The towels were wet and the attendant was rude. But all of us have congestion and ‚Ä¶
Lazy people here, more then 1 hour waiting for a shower with 1 person ahead of me
Really 17$us for this shower ü§Æ no Light, garbage full, no lock. Not acceptable ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The bathrooms are so moldy the first time I complained 3months ago they said the showers were getting power washed and it wouldn‚Äôt happen again here we are again I am sneezing like crazy and stuffed up from Mold allergies . Bathroom‚Äôs ‚Ä¶
A full sink with hair after cleaning the shower

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a smaller loves with minimal truck parking area. It does have a shower and then has an amazing dog park for the dogs to run around it that is fenced in.

Small shower room, which is not typical for Love's standards.  Apparently the standards of love's are sliding down to the standards of Pilot, I deliberately always take the soul of love's just because they are large and there is a lot of ‚Ä¶

Nice staff but the bathroom/showers are absolutely DISGUSTING...there was a DEAD ROACH in the shower and the drain is missing the cover so someone could EASILY injure themselves if older...floors are stained with mildew and lime buildup... ‚Ä¶

As a truck driver when I stop to take a shower I hope that at least the bathroom is clean, the towels are clean and the place too, this place is definitely the worst Love I have visited in the whole country
Shower review only... Low water pressure, exposed light fixture, mirror and ceiling light not working, exposed wires for security door.

Pulled in for few days and wasn't so clean and running out of toilet paper sometimes also showers aren't clean at all toilet got hair and dirt all over it but didn't get picture of it don't thing anybody want to see dirty shee but did get a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is the NASTIEST location. Had a shower yesterday‚Äôs I was already skeptical because the staff spent exactly 2 minutes ‚Äúcleaning‚Äù after the last person when what he really did was just put in clean towels. Trash over flowing outside, nothing ‚Ä¶

Showers are disgusting. Nats all over the bathroom. I can't believe this is the level of cleanliness here. See for yourself. I would came out of the shower itching. To have to fight off a sworm of nats while in the shower is just horrible. ‚Ä¶

Customer service was OK... bathrooms disgusting... showers need a makeover... it looked like it hadn't been cleaned in ages.... tissue wet ball stuck on the floor.... toilet not clean..... shower mildew... and fan had a whole heap of dust ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Dominic in the shower area was also a lifesaver‚Äîhe helped me find everything I needed, from the location of the showers to the towels, and made sure I was all set. He was friendly, professional, and genuinely cared about making sure I had a ‚Ä¶
Very clean, had plenty of parking by 430, only downside was I had been next in line for a shower, I check again and I was skipped, no usual text, no announcements either. Extremely frustrating.
In for a shower. Janitor was waiting at my door (automated showers) asking me to leave a tip. Yeah, here's a "tip", if you don't like the pay, work somewhere else. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ with forced removal via tow truck a few times.  Even this Flying J has ‚Äò2-hour parking only‚Äô signs all over the yard. That‚Äôs about a meal and the bathroom and laundry and a shower and then you‚Äôre running to the car to be out in 2 hours. ‚Ä¶
I came here to take a shower, but I didn‚Äôt have any points for free shower since I just got pilot rewards card yesterday but they still gave me a free shower!

‚Ä¶ TRIED TO DO ANYTHING THEY COULD TO MAKE US CALM DOWN (66) (60) THAT EVERYTHING WILL BE OK! SO WE DIDNT MIND PAYING TO TAKE A SHOWER AND EAT! CUSTOMER SERVICE AT ITS FINEST!!! 5 üåüTHANK YOU GUYS SO MUCH, MARY ANN AND MARK THE WHOLE CREW ‚Ä¶

The store was nice, showers clean. Mark and Adrienne we very h mogul and the manager needs a lesson on customers courtesy.He is an arrogant boy, that needs to understand without truck drivers he wouldn‚Äôt have a job. I was never so ‚Ä¶

What grown man knocks on the door while another grown man takes a shower, also literally all night someone‚Äôs knocked back and forth on car waking people up. Really strange behavior, honestly surprised‚Ä¶

They are undergoing construction but showers are good. Parking isn‚Äôt bad, does get super congested at night.
The shower attendant even moved me and my boyfriend to a bigger shower, very thoughtful and appreciated!

‚Ä¶ to pull out the Marinara to make sandwhich... Meanwhile no one has checked the reserved parking to see what's available so nothing is "available" and if you're trying to get a shower good luck 15 guest waiting and no one is cleaning them..

showerReviews.reviewText: Huge laundry room & they all work. Subway salad wrap was bomb & no wait for a shower. Overall thanks

‚Ä¶ attitude towards guests. I wish I could say maybe it was just towards me but it wasn't. I stood there waiting for my shower to be called and witnessed her nastiness towards others. Besides her everything else was great. The place is very ‚Ä¶
I try to get refund a shower credit because the waiting time was to long and the cashier said she is not able to to this once I got a receipt this only happens in this TA

They are lazy. Drivers waiting for a shower.  At 7pm five driver was waiting and 5 showers was open with dirty towels on the floor.
Manager Steven didn't do anything in this situation

‚Ä¶ close at 11 so if you get there late you're ass out for food. The showers have very little water pressure and when we asked the manager to reimburse the shower he refused. They are also not as big as normal TAs that I've been to. If you ‚Ä¶
The manager on duty was Pam Bouton, she was absolutely awesome! We had the best shower we have had in 4 years. Plenty of parking, clean lot. Going to get food in a few minutes.
Not very organized, shower water pressure is weak and no hot water. The diesel pumps are missing the key pads.

‚Ä¶ Pride restaurant they serve breakfast lunch and dinner they do discounts for truckers they have a truck wash here and a shower and also for campers they give discounts on points if you use their cards and is also a Popeye's and a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and fueled. Went to get my fuel receit and notify the fuel attendant and i was completely ignored so i then tried to get a shower and had the exact same problem  at the kiosk and finally got it to spit out a shower ticket. So i suggest ‚Ä¶
